program_information.target_population: Poor rural households with mothers of young children

component_a_cash_support.cash_evidence_citation: In TMRI, mothers of young children in poor rural households in two regions of Bangladesh received food or cash transfers, with or without a complementary nutrition behavior change communication (BCC) component

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: We assess (i) program impacts on poverty headcount, depth, and severity in each round, (ii) differences by program receipt in household-level transitions across being poor or non-poor over the three rounds
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: following a randomized control trial design

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: a two-year social safety net pilot program called the Transfer Modality Research Initiative (TMRI)
evidence_citations.country_citation: In TMRI, mothers of young children in poor rural households in two regions of Bangladesh received food or cash transfers
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: mothers of young children in poor rural households in two regions of Bangladesh
